entry.title: the awkward second post
entry.content:
Octopress is great

  • Uses Google to provide site search
  • Archives builtin
  • Tag support
  • Draft posts
  • Local preview
  • Markdown markup
  • Google+, Disqus, Google Analytics support
  • Incremental deployment
  • Deployment to Amazon S3
  • Fast as lightning

Wish I'd bitten the bullet earlier.
